Articles.Content: My camera does not seem to be focussed on the vessel when I do staging (and there is fuel remaining in my old stage) The V button does not focus on my ship and is zoomed out way to much. Is there a way to focus on my ship again?

34 minutes ago, darckbit said:

Is there a way to focus on my ship again?

Have you tried to switch to map view and back again?

Yes. That unfortunately did not work. Switching back to the center and then back to the vessel did not work either. Performing an EVA made a huge explosion and made Bob float around in vacuum. Poor Bob. I am trying to rescue him now  But when I relaunch that vessel, thesame issue appears.
Did you put some wings on your boosters ? I had the same issue and I resolved it by removing them.  Weird
